content.question: The type of complex shown can be defined as an acropolis because it

choices.label: incorporated a temple and an amphitheater
was situated on the highest topographical point of a settlement
was converted from a fortress to a site for religious ritual
functioned as a symbol of democracy

content.answer: was converted from a fortress to a site for religious ritual
